title: GOI Ball Comics
content:
[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[image GOIBallA.jpg width="700px" link="https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/goi-ball-comics/GOIBallA.jpg"]]

> GOIball (or Foundationball), a series of comics concerning various [[[Groups of Interest]]], inspired by Polandball ([https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-1009829/goi-ball-comic Original forum thread]). All of them are based on personal understanding of GOIs, or are simply for fun, thus don't need to be taken seriously. Enjoy!

++ Introduction

[[collapsible show="+ Groups of Interest" hide="- Groups of Interest"]]
[[image Groups%20of%20Interest.jpg width="400px"]]
CotBG's new looks:
[[image New%20Logos.jpg width="400px"]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ Foundation Departments" hide="- Foundation Departments"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/goi-ball-comics/Departments.jpg width="800px"]]
[[/collapsible]]
